author: yoshiki
msg: Try to close Fs and Repos object as early as possible.
* fs.c (close_fs): New function to handle reference count.
* repos.c (close_repos): New function to handle reference count.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: In theory, if you are using HEAD of httpd-2.0, we'll listen.  If you
are using an older version, we'll probably ignore you.  (Greg can
correct me if he wants.)  It should also be safe to just post to
dev@subversion since either Greg or myself will read it.  But, if
you are *sure* it is a bug in httpd-2.0, you can just send it to
dev@httpd in case we're asleep at the wheel.
* BUGS: Tweak section with respect to httpd-2.0 bug reports.
